insights.title: Annoying Crashes
quotes: Uber is one of the best services but sometimes it not find the cab earlier.
The app crashes often.
I have had great experiences but I have also had instances where the app just shuts down.
I had to cancel my rides twice because the app was crashing.

insights.title: Customer Support Issues
quotes: They don't have a live interactive customer care service.
Getting in touch with customer support is nearly impossible.
There is no transparency on charges and the support is nonexistent.
I can't reach anyone and my statement said it's already paid for.

insights.title: High Prices Compared to Competitors
quotes: Always higher price than OLA.
It's sad that Uber used to have many drivers in my area, now it's just prices going up.
They charge a low amount when you accept then after trip they come back to charge your higher amount.
Rates are reasonable but are always higher.

insights.title: Positive Driver Experiences
quotes: I have great experiences with each driver.
He is a very good driver.
My ride arrived on time and the driver was polite.
Drivers are professional and friendly.

insights.title: Inconsistent Navigation and Location Issues
quotes: Needs more accurate improvements while navigating local areas.
The app is overall good but giving it one star rating since they have such a big engineering team and still don't have a feature to upload pictures.
The location pin in the app could go incorrect, especially if you are in a new place.

insights.title: Poor Driver Support
quotes: Not able to connect support team.
Support is poor and doesn't help with issues.
Their policies leave drivers frustrated without proper support.
Customer support is nonexistent when drivers need assistance.

insights.title: Complicated Payment Issues
quotes: Uber promised zero commission but still deducts fees.
Long waiting periods and driver earnings are drastically reduced.
Commissions are getting higher and higher.
The application is designed to benefit the service more than the drivers.

insights.title: Convenience and Comfort
quotes: The best app.
Safe drive.
Excellent service and drivers.
Good experience and timely service.

insights.title: Driver Performance Variability
quotes: Sometimes drivers are incompetent.
They have great drivers, but some just don't follow the app's instructions.
Drivers need better communication skills.
Had a very bad experience with some drivers.

insights.title: Excessive Pricing and Hidden Fees
quotes: They charge triple the upfront ride quote without notice.
Prices have skyrocketed, making Lyft more expensive than Uber.
It's usually cheaper, but not anymore.
The estimated price isnâ€™t the final price.

insights.title: Contract and Customer Service Problems
quotes: Awful customer service.
No response from support after multiple attempts.
Drivers frequently cancel.
I can't get in touch with customer service.

insights.title: Driver Quality
quotes: Every driver I've had is courteous.
Most drivers have been friendly and respectful.
Had an incredible experience with my driver.
Drivers don't follow app protocol.

insights.title: Customer Service Complaints
quotes: Customer service sucks.
Live chat isn't helpful.
No response from support.
Poor service resolution process.

insights.title: Driver Issues
quotes: Driver keeps cancelling.
Many drivers are rude.
Drivers are often late or don't follow routes.
Driver's English was poor.

insights.title: Payment Problems
quotes: Top up issues with international cards.
Payment method options are limited.
Problem with money transfers.
Payments were often charged incorrectly.

insights.title: Poor App Usability
quotes: The app is terrible; it cannot register me.
Customer support wasn't helpful.
Navigating the app is complicated.
App is buggy and needs improvement.

insights.title: Inconsistent Driver Service
quotes: Driver's route was completely wrong.
Drivers often don't follow app directions.
Drivers cancel rides frequently.
Lack of professionalism from drivers.
